duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing documents for filing at the U.S. Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO).
Handling formal document preparation, such as powers of attorney and assignments.
Maintaining shared client document databases and master cited art reference charts.
Identifying and ordering relevant scientific/medical publications.
General office duties, including photocopying, filing, and organizing files.
Engaging in special projects, as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, minimum four years of patent prosecution experience in a legal or corporate environment, Paralegal certificate or equivalent.
